meanings.definition: The action of linking things together in a series.
meanings.sent1: The concatenation of beads on the string made a beautiful necklace.
meanings.sent2: The concatenation of numbers in the sequence was easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: The concatenation of socks in the laundry seemed to create a never-ending pile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a concatenation of joyous notes that filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The concatenation of stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The linking of things in a series.
meanings.sent1: The concatenation of events led to an unexpected outcome.
meanings.sent2: The data was stored in a concatenation of files for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The concatenation of flavors in the dish created a unique taste.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a concatenation of wise words that inspired many.
meanings.sent5: The concatenation of cars on the highway created a traffic jam.
